segments.text: I notice the water overflowing, and it’s making a mess everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is about to fall off that stool, and she doesn’t even see it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her cookie, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is too focused on her task to notice anything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading fast, and it’s going to ruin the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far that he’s going to lose his balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is so excited about the cookies that she doesn’t see the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever look up and see what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is chaotic, but the woman is completely calm.
segments.speaker: PAR
